summary: This mod adds a set of armor (based off of the trailer for Skyrim) that has an enchantment on each piece, each one adding 20% less shout recharge time, totaling at 100%, where you have NO recharge time.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a set of armor, which is based off of the armor the Dragonborn wears in the Skyrim trailer, to the game. What it does is, when a piece is equipped, grants 20% less Shout recharge time. When all pieces (Cuirass, boots, gloves, helmet, and amulet) are worn, you have absolutely no recharge time, effectively allowing you to fight only with the Voice.
Keep in mind, since the pieces of armor recreate (mostly) the armor set from the trailer and promotions, it is both heavy and light armor. Half heavy, half light. I will upload versions that are ONLY light armor and ONLY heavy armor in the future! For now, though, it's half of each.
This armor set was made to look less like a warrior's armor, covered in heavy plate metal, but still retaining a few elements of heavier armor and keeping the iconic Iron helm.
It's located in Delphine's secret room. If you don't know where that is, I'd recommend playing through the main quest.
author: Sgt Awesome
